long_description: The men's REI Windstill jacket features a lightweight material that provides comfortable protection from moderate rain and wind. Water-resistant ripstop polyester shell fabric is wind resistant to 40 mph. Polyester mesh lining enhances breathability and wicks moisture. Side vents allow airflow adjustment. Hood stows inside the collar, so you can adapt your coverage if the weather changes; soft tricot collar lining adds a comfortable touch. Adjustable hem drawcord and stormflap behind the front zip seal out cold air; zipper is also topped by a chin guard. Secure storage is provided by zip hand pockets and a zip chest pocket; chest pocket includes a cord port. The men's REI Windstill Jacket has half-elastic cuffs for a comfortable fit, and angled cuffs to extend coverage over the back of your hands.
short_description: The men's REI Windstill jacket features a lightweight material that provides comfortable protection from moderate rain and wind.
